Name: Sumo In A Sidecar
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Hints of sake but retains the Sidecar style.
Nutrition: One serving of Sumo In A Sidecar contains 149 calories
